title.narrative: IR2: ELIMINATION DE LA TRANSMISSION MERE

description.narrative: D'ici 2013, les nouvelles infections pediatriques sont reduites d'au moins 50% dans les zones de convergence, which contributes to Child Health, Hiv Prevention, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children and women - especially in the most vulnerable households - are have access to a package of high-impact interventions for child survival

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
